alert.note: Alert for Garvin; Grady; McClain (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 5:49AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Garvin, central Grady and southwestern McClain Counties through 615 AM CDT... At 549 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles southeast of Pauls Valley to 3 miles south of Tabler. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Chickasha, Blanchard, Pauls Valley, Purcell, Lindsay, Maysville, Dibble, Wayne, Washington, Paoli, Cole, Alex, Criner, Middleberg, Tabler, Payne and Whitebead. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 67 and 91. Interstate 44 between mile markers 79 and 91. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
